institution: Regents of the University of Michigan - Dearborn
award_title: MRI: Track 1 Acquisition of Hierarchical Testing Framework for Power and Energy Systems Supporting Multidisciplinary Research and Education at the University of Michigan-Dearborn
subject: Reducing friction around shared methods
body:
Hi Dr. Bui,

With your hierarchical testing framework supporting work across smart grids, energy storage, and electric vehicles—plus collaborators from academia and industry—I imagine a fair amount of time goes into fielding requests: sharing scripts, explaining how to run validation code, pointing people to the right datasets.

I'm working on Ouro, a place where published computational methods become callable, reusable infrastructure—so others can build on your work without reimplementing it from scratch.

It won't replace your testing framework, but it could give your control algorithms and optimization methods a durable endpoint that others can actually use.

If you're curious, I can show you how it works.

Hope winter break gives you some downtime—happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
